name: Green Thread of Fate
description:
One fine day, our cheerful protagonist stumbles across a mysterious portal and dives right into a world of adventure and friendship!

  • Find the four elemental warriors and summon the dragon god!
  • Fight a bunch of giant monsters!
  • Enjoy a wide array of dated references!
  • Make lots of friends along the way!
  • Technically a reverse harem but with aromanticism and friendship!

Originally created for Rainbow Jam 2019.

Development State

The game is complete but may have a few minor errors remaining - if you find any, please let me know in the comments or by contacting @luciellaes on Twitter. It also does not have music or sound effects at present (this may change in the future). I have made the game PWYW as of launch but will likely shift this to a fixed price model further down the track.

Content Warnings

Contains coarse language and violence. Contains flashing effects which can be disabled in the options menu if necessary. Contains references to aphobia and other forms of queer discrimination, though not in detail. The general tone is light and humorous, though with a few more serious sections.
